we see a lot of potential for regenerative agriculture to not only stop those emissions.
soil can act as a carbon sink, suck all that CO2 out of the atmosphere, put it into the soil.
it's also really, really important for plants and healthy soil.
that turns into actual sort of nutrients to have a very healthy soil profile.
